EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo v4.5 - NetApp & UCS Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
VMTurbo just released <http://www.vmturbo.com/?p=10092> v4.5. We are extending our control system beyond the hypervisor into the converged fabric and deeper into storage.
- Control modules for NetApp and Cisco UCS <http://bit.ly/1lilXre> that enable VMTurbo to calculate actions for these infrastructure components, such as provisioning new storage controllers, new ports, or spinning up a new blade – all automatically, all optimally.
Attend our webinar to learn more:
- Thursday, January 30th 8:00AM - 9:00AM http://bit.ly/1eKySg2 - Thursday, January 30th 12:00PM - 1:00PM http://bit.ly/1gMwpBa
Upgrade Process
- Upgrade from 4.x – If your appliance has internet connectivity, the update will appear in Admin > Maintenance > Software Updates; the upgrade is a one-click install. If your appliance does not have internet connectivity, or you wish to do an offline update, please follow these steps <https://support.vmturbo.com/hc/en-us/articles/200682076>. - Upgrade from 3.x – To upgrade from 3.x, you must download a new appliance to replace your existing installed instance. Please refer to this article <https://support.vmturbo.com/hc/en-us/articles/200883788> for full details.
Upgrade Support
- We are here to help. Go to http://support.vmturbo.com <http://support.vmturbo.com> to open a ticket or call us at +1 (914) 495-3502
Best regards, VMTurbo
